text: 2:14 Ua Me Ini 19:5; Godɨn Araziba 4:20; 7:6; 14:2; Onger Akaba 130:8; Esekiel 37:23; Galesia 1:4; 1 Pita 2:9Krais kamaghɨn ifonge, a uam e inigh en arazir kuraba adangasa. Eghtɨ e bar zuegh an gumazamizibar mɨn ikiam. Egh e arazir aghuibar amusɨ bar ifongegham. Bizir kam bagha, a uabɨ uan mɨkarzim anigha, areme.
